title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Appomattox Podcast Tour
body: Appomattox Podcast Tour         The McLean House was the site of the surrender meeting between Generals Lee and Grant. NPS  The Appomattox Podcast is a five-mile walking tour narrated by Appomattox Court House NHP historian, Patrick Schroeder.  Note: the website you will linking to may take several minutes to load. If you are new to Podcasting, there is instructional information on the Civil War Traveler website under "Multimedia."
